channel.title: Recent Executive Orders
channel.description: Latest Executive Orders from the White House

item.title: Extending the Modification of the Reciprocal Tariff Rates
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency

item.title: Ending Market Distorting Subsidies for Unreliable, Foreign‑Controlled Energy Sources
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1.

item.title: Establishing the President’s Make America Beautiful Again Commission
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.

item.title: Making America Beautiful Again by Improving Our National Parks
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Policy.

item.title: Providing for the Revocation of Syria Sanctions
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency

item.title: Further Extending the TikTok Enforcement Delay
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Extension.

item.title: Implementing the General Terms of The United States of America-United Kingdom Economic Prosperity Deal
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including the International Emergency

item.title: Regarding the Proposed Acquisition of the United States Steel Corporation by Nippon Steel Corporation
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, including section 721 of the Defense

item.title: Empowering Commonsense Wildfire Prevention and Response
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered:Section 1. Purpose. The

item.title: Leading The World in Supersonic Flight
item.description: By the authority vested in me as President by the Constitution and the laws of the United States of America, it is hereby ordered: Section 1. Purpose.
